title: [1.10.X]Enrichedobsidian 有用的黑曜石 ———— 让黑曜石丰富你的生存吧
author: 青木源
txt_content:
本帖最后由 XIAOMM 于 2016-9-1 21:32 编辑 

 介绍
This mod is for minecraft 1.10.2. It adds a new ore called Enriched Obsidian Ore. This is found between levels 2 and 7. It is more rare than diamond and as such the tools and armour are superior to that of diamond. The ore can be smelted down into enriched obsidian ingots. These form the base for all tools and armour crafted in this mod.
这个模组添加了一种矿物——黑曜石矿，它比钻石稀有，在地下2-7层之间生成，黑曜石矿物烧制后变成黑曜石锭，黑曜石锭可以制作各种各样的工具装备，它们也比钻石的好许多
